Texts.Chs: 把^green;木制筛粉机^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Wooden Sifter^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 如果你有一堆松散的砂粒材料，比如^orange;泥沙^reset;, ^orange;砾石^reset;或者^green;其他粉状材料^reset;，可以直接把它们扔进^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;，这样就能从中提取资源！现在就建造一台^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: If you have stacks of loose grit like ^orange;silt^reset;, ^orange;Gravel^reset; or ^green;other powdery materials^reset; then just toss them in a ^orange;Sifter^reset; and you can pull resources right out of them! Build a ^orange;Sifter^reset; now.

Texts.Chs: 木制筛粉机非常低效且缓慢，所以条件允许的话，我建议你在电子设备制造机处将其升级为 ^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Wooden sifters are terribly inefficient and slow, so as soon as you can I advice upgrading to a ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; at an Electronics Center.
